Codism LLC is a global technology and business services consulting firm specializing in Business and IT Consulting Services to commercial and private customers.  We have core practice in Web development & Mobile Apps. Our technology expertise includes Angular , node.js ,MVC, .Net Core 2+, Windows Forms, C# API building, and Windows Services ,Phyton(Django), WordPress ,Go, PHP, JAVA, Magento2,AngularJS, React etc.

Codism has experts who have average 10+ years of Industry experience & offers IT services with equal or better quality than its high-end competition BUT at a price point resulting in savings of 55% or more over its larger competitors.  We have a very high client satisfaction rating because of our “Deliver as Promised” mentality and very deep relationships with our clients.
Clients choose CODISM for its ability to solve problems, depth of capabilities, industry expertise, global presence, track record of delivering measurable results and access to an unrivaled talent pool. We have strong capabilities in latest emerging technologies such as Block chain & Microsoft Custom-Development of Application Solutions, Testing, Project and Program Management, Infrastructure, Cloud, and Mobile Applications. Our Global Delivery Centers span 2 locations in the US in North America and 1 more across the world.
 We help many companies successful launched their projects with tide timeline, resource shortage, our Team will work as your engagement Team and follow your management’s process as your employees. Our solutions work closely with your need that bring great value for your company.
